original_title: Nuwara Eliya Chills at 14°C: Sri Lanka’s Coldest Spot on September 26
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka experienced a range of minimum temperatures across the island on the morning of 26 September 2025, with Nuwara Eliya recording the lowest temperature at 14.0°C, according to data from the Department of Meteorology.
The temperature readings, collected from meteorological stations nationwide, were visualized on a map showing a gradient from cooler highland regions to warmer coastal and northern zones.
The central highlands, particularly Nuwara Eliya, continue to exhibit significantly cooler temperatures compared to the rest of the island.
